item.title: 棕榈油因林吉特疲软和产量预期下降而上涨
item.description: 棕榈油从一周低点反弹，原因是马来西亚货币走软，以及预期第二大种植国 9 月份产量下降。【原文：Palm oil rebounded from a one-week low on a weaker Malaysian currency and expectations of lower production in the second-biggest grower in September.】

item.title: 以色列在加沙的长期战争和大规模征召令高科技经济倍感压力
item.description: 随着加沙战争愈演愈烈，几乎没有停火的迹象，以色列的经济和商业正面临进一步的压力。【原文：With the war in Gaza intensifying and little to no sign of a ceasefire, Israel’s economy and businesses are bracing for further strain.】

item.title: 对美贸易下滑，马来西亚出口增长令人失望
item.description: 由于上个月美国开始征收更高的关税，中断了这个东南亚国家与世界最大经济体的贸易往来，马来西亚的出口增幅低于预期。【原文：Malaysia’s exports rose less than expected as higher US levies that kicked in last month disrupted the Southeast Asian nation’s trade with the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 印尼最大贷款机构在经济刺激政策下削减贷款增长目标
item.description: 印尼最大的贷款机构印尼曼迪里银行（PT Bank Mandiri）下调了今年的贷款增长预期，尽管该行已从政府获得新的资金用于发放贷款以支持经济。【原文：Indonesia’s largest lender PT Bank Mandiri cut its loan growth estimate for this year despite receiving fresh funds from the government for lending disbursement to support the economy.】

item.title: 特朗普与习近平通话前大豆引领谷物期货反弹
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与中国总统习近平通电话之前，美国谷物期货周五全线上涨，交易商希望两国之间长期存在的经济争端能取得突破。【原文：US grain futures rose across the board on Friday ahead of an expected phone call between President Donald Trump and his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping, with traders hoping for a breakthrough in the long-running economic dispute between the two nations.】

item.title: 中国联合国特使指责美国 "滥用 "加沙问题否决权
item.description: 中国抨击美国阻止联合国安理会呼吁立即在加沙停火的决议，这表明中国政府在寻求重塑全球治理时对联合国系统的不满。【原文：China slammed the US for blocking a United Nations Security Council resolution calling for an immediate ceasefire in Gaza, signaling Beijing’s frustration with the system just as it seeks to reshape global governance.】

item.title: 奥地利财政部长认为逐步实现欧盟联合债务
item.description: 据奥地利财政部长称，欧盟正在逐步发行联合债务，以帮助为改善经济所需的投资提供资金。【原文：The European Union is inching toward issuing joint debt to help fund investments needed to improve its economy, according to Austria’s finance minister.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行负利率已被大多数经济学家排除在下周议程之外
item.description: 目前，几乎所有经济学家都预测瑞士国家银行下周将维持利率不变，而此前有几位经济学家已不再预期瑞士国家银行会将利率降至零以下。【原文：The Swiss National Bank is now predicted by almost all economists to keep its interest rate unchanged next week after several of them switched from expecting a cut below zero.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券和投资委员会（ASIC）因风险问题暂时禁止 RELI Capital 基金运作
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管机构对当地精品公司 RELI Capital Ltd. 管理的基金发布了临时禁令，原因是担心该产品可能不 "适合 "投资者。【原文：Australia’s corporate regulator has issued a temporary ban on a fund managed by local boutique firm RELI Capital Ltd. over concerns the product may not be “suitable” for investors.】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率稳定并表示将开始出售 ETF
item.description: 日本央行维持基准利率不变，以求进一步澄清挥之不去的经济和政治不确定性，并宣布将开始卸载交易所交易基金。【原文：The Bank of Japan left its benchmark interest rate unchanged as it sought more clarity over lingering economic and political uncertainty, and announced that it will begin offloading exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: 亚洲英特尔供应商因英伟达投资有望提振而飙升
item.description: 芯片制造商英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）投资 50 亿美元的消息传出后，英特尔公司股价周五大涨 23%，英特尔公司的亚洲供应商股价也随之攀升。【原文：Asian suppliers to Intel Corp. saw their shares climb Friday after the US tech firm’s stock jumped 23% following news of a $5 billion investment by chipmaker Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 技术官僚在泰国总理阿努丁的新内阁阵容中担任要职
item.description: 泰国总理阿努丁-占维拉库（Anutin Charnvirakul）周五公布了他的内阁阵容，将由技术官僚担任重要部委的负责人，以指导泰国经济应对美国关税和高额家庭债务的影响。【原文：Thai Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul unveiled his cabinet lineup on Friday, tapping technocrats to head key ministries to steer an economy grappling with the fallout of US tariffs and high household debt.】

item.title: 小米将为约 40% 的 SU7 电动汽车部署辅助驾驶修复系统
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）将部署一个空中软件修复程序，以纠正其先进驾驶辅助技术中的一个问题，该技术已安装在其销售的近 40% 的 SU7 电动轿车上。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. will deploy an over-the-air software fix to rectify a problem in its advanced driver assistance technology installed in almost 40% of the SU7 electric sedans it’s sold.】

item.title: TS Lombard称，随着蔓延担忧缓解，长债值得买入
item.description: TS Lombard认为，全球较长期限主权债券是今年表现最差的固定收益资产之一，这种看跌情绪可能即将减弱，使这些证券成为买点。【原文：The bearish sentiment that has made global longer-maturity sovereign bonds among the worst-performing fixed-income assets this year may be about to wane, making the securities a buy, according to TS Lombard.】

item.title: 欧洲电动汽车制造商在爱沙尼亚稀土磁铁工厂排队等候
item.description: 欧洲电动汽车行业的高管们正跋山涉水来到欧洲大陆人口稀少的东北部地区，排队购买他们在中国以外的任何地方都很难找到的东西：电动汽车的重要部件稀土磁铁。【原文：Executives from Europe’s electric-vehicle industry are trekking to the continent’s sparsely populated northeastern parts to queue for something they struggle to find anywhere outside of China: rare-earths magnets that are essential components in EVs.】

item.title: 韩国放宽银行入股规定以刺激高科技投资
item.description: 韩国推出了旨在将银行资金从房地产贷款转向包括半导体和人工智能在内的关键产业的措施。【原文：South Korea rolled out measures aimed at redirecting bank funds from property lending to critical industries including semiconductors and artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 孙正义转向人工智能后，软银愿景基金考虑裁员 20
item.description: 一位熟知内情的人士透露，软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）的愿景基金（Vision Fund）正在考虑裁员多达 20%，这凸显了孙正义的工作重心正在转向对人工智能的雄心勃勃的押注。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp.’s Vision Fund is considering cutting as much as 20% of its staff, a person familiar with the matter said, underscoring a shift in Masayoshi Son’s focus to ambitious bets on artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 美国关税威胁出口，越南引导越南盾走低
item.description: 越南正在利用货币贬值这一古老的策略来获得相对于东南亚同行的竞争优势，因为各国都在想方设法减轻美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易关税负担。【原文：Vietnam is using the age-old tactic of currency depreciation to gain a competitive advantage over its Southeast Asian peers as nations look for ways to ease the burden from US President Donald Trump’s trade tariffs.】

item.title: 贝莱德称印度债券将因外资流入而反弹
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Indian bonds present an attractive opportunity for foreign investors after a bruising selloff, according to a BlackRock Inc. product strategist.】

item.title: 国内生产总值大幅下滑挑战新西兰政府的经济管理能力
item.description: 新西兰总理克里斯托弗-卢克松（Christopher Luxon）和财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）正面临着有关他们对经济管理的质疑，因为第二季度的经济萎缩远远超出了人们的预期。【原文：New Zealand Prime Minister Christopher Luxon and Finance Minister Nicola Willis are facing questions about their stewardship of the economy after it contracted much more than anyone expected in the second quarter.】

item.title: 美联储降息谨慎削弱需求，黄金连续第三天下跌
item.description: 黄金连续第三天下滑，原因是交易商对美联储未来降息持谨慎态度，加上美元走强，抑制了贵金属近期的大涨。【原文：Gold slipped for a third day, as traders’ caution over future Federal Reserve rate cuts, along with a stronger dollar, tempered the precious metal’s recent surge.】

item.title: 日本住房金融公司以 2023 年以来最宽利差出售人民币债券
item.description: 据主要管理人高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Japan Housing Finance Agency sold ¥50.2 billion ($340 million) of residential mortgage-backed securities at the widest spread in more than two years, according to lead manager Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 日本两年期政府债券收益率升至 2008 年以来最高点
item.description: 由于市场对日本央行今年可能加息的预期增强，日本两年期国债下跌，收益率升至 2008 年以来的最高水平。【原文：Japan’s two-year government bonds fell, pushing yields to the highest level since 2008 amid increased expectations that the central bank may raise interest rates this year.】

item.title: 加拿大、墨西哥承诺就与美国的贸易协定审查进行协调
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税威胁使加拿大和墨西哥的贸易协定面临风险，两国领导人承诺在明年对两国与美国的贸易协定进行高风险审查之前密切协调。【原文：The leaders of Canada and Mexico committed to close coordination ahead of next year’s high-stakes review of their trade pact with the US as President Donald Trump’s tariff threats put the accord at risk.】

item.title: 野村中国合资公司因劳资纠纷遭前高管起诉
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc.’s joint venture in China was sued by its former deputy head over labor issues, the latest setback for the firm in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 印度高速交易公司向实习生开出月薪 1.4 万美元的条件
item.description: 高速交易公司正在迅速提高印度初级职位的薪酬，以应对全球最大股票衍生品市场的监管打击。【原文：High-speed trading firms are rapidly increasing pay for entry-level jobs in India, brushing off a regulatory crackdown on the world’s biggest equity derivatives market.】

item.title: 台湾在关键财富指标上领先韩国，台积电功不可没
item.description: 今年，台湾的财富将在二十多年来首次超过韩国，这标志着台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan is set to surpass South Korea this year in terms of wealth for the first time in over two decades, marking a shift in Asia’s economic ranks made possible by the ascent of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.】

item.title: CATL 股价在上涨 1100 亿美元后仍被认为便宜
item.description: 人们通常不会把 "便宜 "这个形容词与一支在几个月内几乎翻了一番的股票联系在一起。但这正是一些投资者对 Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.Ltd.【原文：Cheap isn’t an adjective one would typically associate with a stock that’s nearly doubled in a matter of months. But that’s exactly how some investors are describing Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd.】

item.title: 特朗普撤销刑期后，美国证券交易委员会撤销卡洛斯-沃森欺诈案
item.description: 小卡洛斯-沃森（Carlos Watson Jr.）是现已解散的 Ozy Media 公司的联合创始人，他因在数字初创企业中向投资者撒谎而被定罪，唐纳德-特朗普总统免除了他近 10 年的监禁。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission is dropping its fraud case against Carlos Watson Jr., the co-founder of now-defunct Ozy Media Inc. who was spared by President Donald Trump from an almost 10-year prison term after he was convicted of lying to investors in the digital startup.】
